synopsis.text:
Childhood friends Karen Aijou and Hikari Kagura share a dream of performing on the world-renowned Starlight stage together. As they grow older, their paths diverge, but their shared ambition remains alive in their hearts. Karen, now a student at Seishou Music Academy, stumbles upon a hidden underground theater where her classmates engage in intense battles to determine who will be the 'Top Star' and earn the coveted lead roles in the school's annual Seishou Festival.

Reunited with Hikari after years apart, Karen seizes the opportunity to make their childhood promise a reality. Together with other aspiring performers, they compete in a mysterious audition process to join the prestigious Starlight revue troupe. The girls hone their talents in singing, dancing, and acting, pouring their hearts into every performance as they strive to outshine their rivals.

With the curtains about to rise, the girls' unwavering dedication to their lifelong dream sets the stage for an unforgettable spectacle, as they fight not only for a spot in the limelight but also to rekindle the bond that once united them under the stars.
